CMATOOLS Documentation

The CMATOOLS python package was developed for training purposes only.

Do not use for production purposes.

This package, and associated subpackages, provide a range of commonly used functions, for import and use in CMA projects.

The package and associated GitHub repo also serve for use via training tutorials and as a template project.
